website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the GT 2000 8 GTX has been mostly positive. Runners say that this Asics running shoe has a performance that is adequate for their daily tasks. The strong features of this running shoe make it versatile enough to run on varying surfaces and weather conditions.Fans of stability running shoes are the target market of the Asics GT 2000 8 GTX.
pros: The waterproof mechanism present in the Asics GT 2000 8 GTX is welcomed by many consumers
Some testers believe that this running shoe works well as a companion for the trails
The stability given by the midsole unit is praised by those who have concerns with pronation
Several consumers have noted that the cushioning system is comfortable and able to properly attenuate impact
The uncluttered design of the upper unit is praised by consumers as it doesn’t mar the aesthetics
cons: A few people remarked that the in-shoe experience is stuffy
A tester has claimed that this product is not ideal for all-day wear
it apparently caused discomfort after long-term use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have used my GTX-2000 8 shoes for two short (5K) runs now and found them very comfortable from the start, without any breaking in required. My previous pair were Brooks Adrenalin GTS 18, which I also rate highly and find the Asics seem just as good, with the added advantage of being completely waterproof. My last run was in the wet, and as expected my feet were still dry at the end. They seem to be still breathable, but time (and longer runs) will tell. They also look great, so I have no hesitation in giving them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gore tex lining limits toe space
customer_reviews.text: They are a good quality shoe but you may need to go up one size as the gore tex lining impedes toe space. I lost a big toe nail as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stability shoes from Asics but
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really good and stable, the cushioning feels a bit stiff but it is too stable. the issue is having too hard a heel counter which may cause sourness around the ankle/heel, so it is not Achilles or Peroneal tendon friendly. Another known issue is having bad breathability due to waterproofing material. it will be good for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed L.

customer_reviews.title: The gore Tex and how light they are
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of the gore Tex and I love black trainers just not been able to put these to test yet as I’m full of cold 😡
customer_reviews.author: steven gill

customer_reviews.title: Its great to know i can reurn if i need to
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and the shoes are very comfortable thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Bangin for the dough
customer_reviews.text: Improved my C25k game drastically ... turns out I have flat feet/fallen arches An these are really good
customer_reviews.author: Craigo

customer_reviews.title: Very good waterproof trainers
customer_reviews.text: They don't make any "gore tex" noise, very comfortable ( even first use ), very good support. Great for running but not as breathable as non goretex trainers.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: for runners
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but I have been buying them for years they never disapoint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit. I have wide feet and they fit perfectly without needing to buy the size up. Have always bough Asics trainers and these have kept to my high expectations happiness with their products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leslie

customer_reviews.title: GT 2000 with water protection
customer_reviews.text: I've had many pairs of Asics GT running shoes, but this is the first GTX version I've had, but all familiar and good so far
customer_reviews.author: muser

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gt-2000 8 G-tx Running Shoe
product_meta.description: These stable shoes GT-2000 8 G-TX for overpronouncing runners were specially developed for long-distance runs. The largest adaptation of the GT-2000 8 can be found in the midsole. The upper of the GTX version is made of GORE-TEX material. This gives the upper material waterproof properties so that your feet stay comfortably dry even when wet. The Flytefoam cushioning material is lighter and gives back more energy than the Solyte foam. Forefoot and heel areas have also been given more GEL to ensure better cushioning. The forefoot is more flexible and enables easier rolling. Dynamic Duomax technology and the Trusstic System provide stability and support for overpronators by preventing the feet from kinking inward when landing.
feature_bullets: GEL technology in both forefoot and rearfoot
